e: ￹`O~ `ramod~ `ako~ `konini~.￺This is my spouse.￻這是我太太(丈夫)
￹`Pa~`ramod~`en~ `ko~ `wawa~ `iso~.￺Find a mate for your child.￻讓你的孩子成親
￹`O~ `pi~`pararamodan~ `to~ `wawa~ `anini~.￺This is our child's wedding day.￻今天是孩子結婚日子
￹`Pito~ `a~ `kasa~`ramo~`ramod~ `no~ `kahirahira~ `no~ `ma~`efer~`ay~ `a~ `'ayam~ `ko~ `ma~`ala~`ay~ `ni~`~ `Nowa~.￺Nowa took seven pairs of all kinds of birds.￻挪亞帶七對各種鳥類進來
d.f: ￹￺to select pairs * as of animals￻配對，如動物
￹￺to put side by side with another￻併組挪放
